title: Set custom site domain to beyhubx.com (frontend wiring)

requirements.summary: Add client-side redirect to ensure visits from any non-canonical host redirect to https://beyhubx.com while preserving path/query/hash.
acceptanceCriteria: The app is reachable at https://beyhubx.com/ in a browser.
If the app is also reachable via any previous default/temporary domain, visiting that domain redirects to https://beyhubx.com/ (preserving the path and hash fragment when present).

file_operations.description: Add an early <script> in <head> that checks window.location.hostname and, when it is not "beyhubx.com", performs a replace redirect to "https://beyhubx.com" concatenated with the existing pathname, search, and hash to preserve full navigation context.

requirements.summary: Update HTML head metadata to use https://beyhubx.com as the canonical and share-preview URL.
acceptanceCriteria: The built frontend includes canonical/URL metadata referencing https://beyhubx.com (no references to an old domain in head metadata).

file_operations.description: Add/adjust head metadata to reference the canonical site URL "https://beyhubx.com" (e.g., <link rel="canonical"> and social meta such as Open Graph URL), ensuring no old/default domain remains in head metadata.
